thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simply the best
thread.title_full: Simply the best - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Pib1014
title: Simply the best
text: This is one of the finest hotels we have ever visited. It is intimate, superbly appointed, has a marvelous staff, and extremely comfortable accommodations. The staff could not have been more attentive, helpful and always cheerful. The bar is one of the highlights of the hotel. It is cozy, very British, has great martinis and a fabulous bartender. Breakfast is not to be missed. From the complete buffet to the delicious "full English" and the terrific wait staff, this is a treat. Of course the central location of the hotel is another important feature as is its location on a quiet street in a neighborhood setting. By all standards-superb!
